service_description.short_description: The service receives a text string and uses it as input to the pre-trained model. The model returns the predicted emotion of the given text.
service_description.description: The service receives a text string and uses it as input to the pre-trained model. The model returns the predicted emotion of the given text. List of emotions predicted by the model: "0": "admiration", "1": "amusement", "2": "anger", "3": "annoyance", "4": "approval", "5": "caring", "6": "confusion", "7": "curiosity", "8": "desire", "9": "disappointment", "10": "disapproval", "11": "disgust", "12": "embarrassment", "13": "excitement", "14": "fear", "15": "gratitude", "16": "grief", "17": "joy", "18": "love", "19": "nervousness", "20": "optimism", "21": "pride", "22": "realization", "23": "relief", "24": "remorse", "25": "sadness", "26": "surprise", "27": "neutral"
